resources.string: "The information provided in this app is not meant to be used, nor should it be used, to diagnose or treat any medical condition. This text and the privacy policy can be seen at any times under http://jfrewert.de/?page_id=483"
Do you want to export your Data to excel?
To add a new Entry, please click + in the lower right corner.
All FT3 or FT4 values must have an Entry!

Disclaimer
The information provided in this app is not meant to be used, nor should it be used, to diagnose or treat any medical condition.
